change_plan.question: Can I switch plans at any time?
change_plan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to a higher plan at any time. When you do, automatic proration is applied: you only pay the proportional difference for the remaining time in your current cycle. The change is applied immediately and you don't lose any data or access. If you need to move to a lower plan, contact us and we'll help you with the process.

payment_methods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment_methods.answer: We accept payments through MercadoPago (credit cards, debit cards, and account balance) and PayPal for international payments. We also offer the option of bank transfer. All payments are processed securely and encrypted.

data_retention.question: What happens to my data if I cancel?
data_retention.answer: When moving to the Free plan, you keep access to your data but with the limitations of the free plan. Your projects, contacts, and records remain stored. If you decide to return to a paid plan in the future, all your information will be available just as you left it.

billing_cycle.question: How does the billing cycle work?
billing_cycle.answer: We offer monthly and annual billing. The annual plan includes a 20% discount compared to the monthly price. Your subscription is activated from the moment of payment and renews manually at the end of each cycle. You will receive a notification before expiration so you can renew.

user_roles.question: How do members and roles work?
user_roles.answer: The Free plan includes 1 member. Pro and Teams plans include a base number of members, and in Teams you can purchase additional seats as needed. All paid plans allow you to assign roles with specific permissions (Admin, Member, etc.) to control what each person can do in your organization.

enterprise.question: Do you have solutions for large companies?
enterprise.answer: Yes, we offer customized solutions for organizations with special needs. This includes training for your team, priority support, and configurations adapted to your operation. It's ideal for construction companies or developers managing multiple projects simultaneously. For more information, <contact>contact our team</contact>.

NotFound.title: Oops! We lost the blueprints...
NotFound.subtitle: This page is under construction or was never built.
NotFound.description: Maybe an architect accidentally deleted it, or a brick fell on the link. While we look for the cement mixer, head back to solid ground.

hero.subtitle: Join the pioneers shaping the future of construction management and access exclusive lifetime benefits.
hero.cta: I Want to Be a Founder

essence.title: A unique and unrepeatable opportunity
essence.description1: The Founding Members Program is a <bold>limited-time offer</bold> designed to form a select group of committed users who will act as strategic product advisors.
essence.description2: Your direct feedback will help us <bold>accelerate development</bold> and prioritize the features that really matter to construction professionals.
essence.description3: In exchange for your commitment, you will receive <bold>exclusive lifetime benefits</bold> that will never again be available to new users.

organizational.title: Organizational Benefit
organizational.description: Founder status applies to your entire Organization, not just you. All team members automatically inherit the benefits.

training.description: Free and permanent access to the training bonus included in the subscription. Currently: Complete Archicad Course.

directory.title: Founding Organizations Directory
directory.description: Your organization will be included in our public founder directory, visible on the Seencel website.

permanent.title: Permanent Status
permanent.description: Once a founder, always a founder. The status is lifetime as long as you maintain your active subscription.

course.title: Complete Archicad Course
course.description: As a founding member, you get <bold>free and included</bold> access to the current training bonus. It's currently the most complete Archicad course in Spanish, a program valued at <bold>USD $169/year</bold> that you can enjoy at no additional cost while you maintain your active subscription.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Have questions? Here are the most common answers.

items.whatIsIncludedAnswer: The course includes full access to all modules and lessons, downloadable practice files, access to the exclusive Discord community, certificate of completion, and future updates at no extra cost.
items.howLongAccess: How long do I have access?
items.howLongAccessAnswer: Access is lifetime. Once you enroll, you can watch the content as many times as you want, whenever you want, with no time limits.
items.needPriorKnowledgeAnswer: No prior experience is necessary. The course is designed to take you from zero to professional level, step by step.
items.whichVersion: Which software version do I need?
items.whichVersionAnswer: We recommend using the latest version of the software. The course is compatible with versions 24, 25, and 26.
items.getCertificate: How do I get my certificate?
items.getCertificateAnswer: Upon completing all course lessons, your digital certificate will be automatically generated for you to download and share on LinkedIn.
items.moneyBackAnswer: Yes, we offer a 30-day guarantee. If the course doesn't meet your expectations, we'll refund 100% of your money, no questions asked.

testimonials.title: What our students say
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from professionals who transformed their careers

Privacy.title: Privacy and Data Protection Policy
Privacy.intro: At Seencel, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information.

about.title: 1. About Seencel
about.description: Seencel is a comprehensive management platform for construction and architecture. We offer tools for project management, budget tracking, team management, documentation, financial analysis, and professional training.
items: Construction project management
Financial tracking and budgeting with multi-currency support
Staff management and assignments
Documentation and file system
Professional training module
AI-powered intelligent analysis and reporting
Google Maps integration for geolocation
Payment system for courses and subscriptions

applicability.title: 2. Applicability
items: You visit our website (seencel.com and related domains)
You register or log in to our platform
You use our services as an authorized user
You participate in our training programs
You make payments or transactions on our platform
You interact with our AI and assistance features
You contact us for support or inquiries

direct.title: Information You Provide Directly
direct.description: We collect the following information when you register or use our services:
items: Contact Information: Name, surname, email address, phone number, country, date of birth
Professional Information: Organization name, job title, area of specialization
Account Information: Username, password (encrypted), profile photo, user preferences
Transactional Information: Billing details, address, payment information (processed by third parties), purchase history
User Content: Documents, files, images, videos, notes, comments, and any content you upload
Project Information: Project data, budgets, tasks, personnel, schedules, locations
AI Interactions: Queries to the AI assistant, prompts, conversations

automatic.title: Information Collected Automatically
items: Usage Information: Pages visited, features used, time spent, navigation patterns
Device Information: Device type, OS, browser, IP address, unique identifiers
Location Information: Approximate location based on IP, precise location if gps authorized
Cookies and Similar Technologies: We use cookies to improve experience (see Cookies Policy)
Performance Data: Server logs, response times, errors, performance metrics

google.title: Google Data We Access
google.description: When you choose to sign in with your Google account, we access the following data from your Google profile:
items: Basic Profile Information: Name, surname, Google email address
Profile Picture: Your Google profile picture (if publicly available)
Google User ID: Unique identifier of your Google account for authentication
google.disclaimer: Important: We only access the minimum information necessary to create and manage your account. We do not access your Gmail emails, Google Drive, calendar, or other Google services. We do not store your Google password.
google.mapsDescription: When you use Google Maps on our platform for project geolocation:
mapsItems: Project Location Data: GPS coordinates, addresses, geographic info entered for projects
Map Visualization Data: Map interactions, zoom, location searches

usage.title: 4. How We Use Your Data
usage.description: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

subsections.title: Service Provision
items: Create and manage your user account
Authenticate your identity when signing in
Provide access to platform features and modules
Process and store your project data, documents, and content
Facilitate collaboration with other organization members
Generate reports, analysis, and visualizations of your data

subsections.title: Service Improvement
items: Analyze usage patterns to optimize user experience
Develop new features and improvements
Conduct A/B testing and usability studies
Train and improve our AI models
Identify and solve technical issues

subsections.title: Communication
items: Send important notifications about your account
Respond to inquiries and support requests
Send service updates and new feature announcements
Marketing communications (only if consented)

subsections.title: Transactions and Payments
items: Process payments for subscriptions and courses
Generate invoices and receipts
Prevent fraud and unauthorized usage
Manage refunds when applicable

subsections.title: Legal Compliance and Security
items: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
Protect platform and user security
Prevent misuse, fraud, or illegal activities
Enforce our Terms of Service

sharing.title: 5. Sharing Data with Third Parties
sharing.generalPolicy: General Policy: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We only share data in the following limited circumstances:

providers.title: Service Providers
providers.description: We share information with service providers helping us operate our platform. These providers have limited access to data only to perform specific services on our behalf:
items: Supabase: Auth and database storage (located in region matching your location)
Neon Database: PostgreSQL database storage
Vercel: Hosting and Content Delivery Network (CDN)
OpenAI: AI query processing (anonymized data)
Google Maps Platform: Geolocation and maps services
Mercado Pago: Payment processing in ARS (Argentina)
PayPal: Payment processing in USD
Vimeo: Hosting and streaming of educational videos
Twilio: WhatsApp notifications (if enabled)

organization.title: Within Your Organization
organization.description: When part of an organization in Seencel, project data, documents, and activities are shared with authorized members based on admin permissions.

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.description: We may disclose information if required by law, court order, or legal process, or if we believe in good faith it is necessary to:
items: Comply with applicable laws or respond to valid government requests
Protect rights, property, or safety of Seencel, our users, or others
Prevent fraud, abuse, or violations of our Terms of Service

corporate.title: Corporate Transfers
corporate.description: In case of merger, acquisition, asset sale or similar, your information may be transferred. We will notify you before your information is subject to a different privacy policy.

location.title: Storage Location
location.description: Your data is stored on secure servers in certified data centers. We use Neon Database (PostgreSQL serverless) operating on cloud infrastructure with high availability and geographic redundancy.

encryption.title: Data Encryption
items: In Transit: All data transmitted between your device and our servers is encrypted using TLS/SSL (HTTPS)
At Rest: Data stored in our database is encrypted using industry standards
Passwords: Passwords are hashed using bcrypt, never stored in plain text
Access Tokens: Session tokens and API keys are stored securely with expiration times

access.title: Controlled Access
items: Row Level Security (RLS) in database to isolate data by user/organization
Multi-factor authentication available for accounts
Audit of access and suspicious activities
Limited access by Seencel staff only when necessary for support

backup.title: Backup and Recovery
backup.description: We perform regular automated backups to prevent data loss. Backups are encrypted and stored in multiple geographic locations.

policy.title: Retention Policy
policy.description: We retain personal information while your account is active or needed to provide services. Specific periods:
items: Account Data: While active + 30 days after deletion
Project Data: While organization is active or determined by you/org
Transactional Data: Min 5 years for legal/accounting
System Logs: 90 days for security/debugging
Marketing Data: Until consent withdrawn or 2 years inactivity
Backups: 30 days in automated backups

deletion.title: Deletion Process
deletion.description: You can request data deletion at any time:
items: From Account: Delete account directly in profile settings
By Email: Send request to contacto@seencel.com
Processing Time: We process deletion requests within 30 days
Permanent Deletion: Deleted data cannot be recovered
Exceptions: We may retain certain info if required by law or pending legal disputes

export.title: Data Export
export.description: Before deleting your account, you can request an export of your data (JSON/CSV). This includes personal info, projects, documents, and activity.

rights.title: 8. Your Privacy Rights
rights.description: Depending on specific location, you may have rights regarding your personal data:
items: Right of Access: Request confirmation of processing and copy of data.
Right of Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data.
Right of Deletion: Request deletion of data subject to exceptions.
Right to Restrict Processing: Request limitation of processing.
Right to Portability: Request copy of data in structured format.
Right to Object: Object to processing for direct marketing.
Right to Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent at any time.

exercise.title: How to Exercise Rights
exercise.description: To exercise these rights, contact contacto@seencel.com. We respond within 30 days.

securityMeasures.title: 9. Security Measures
securityMeasures.description: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect data:
items: Encryption: TLS/SSL in transit, encryption at rest
Authentication: Robust system via Supabase Auth, Google OAuth
Access Control: RLS and granular role-based permissions
Monitoring: Intrusion detection and continuous security monitoring
Backups: Encrypted automated backups
Audits: Regular security reviews and vulnerability tests
Training: Continuous security training for staff
Incident Response: 24/7 incident response plan
securityMeasures.disclaimer: While we take reasonable measures, no system is 100% secure. We recommend strong passwords and never sharing credentials.

thirdParties.title: 10. Third Party Services
thirdParties.description: Our platform integrates third party services. Each has its own privacy policy:
items: Google (OAuth, Maps): Google Privacy Policy
Supabase (Auth, Database): Supabase Privacy Policy
OpenAI (AI): OpenAI Privacy Policy
Mercado Pago (Payments): Mercado Pago Privacy Policy
PayPal (Payments): PayPal Privacy Policy
Vimeo (Videos): Vimeo Privacy Policy
thirdParties.disclaimer: We are not responsible for third party privacy practices. Usage subject to their terms.

minors.title: 11. Children's Privacy
minors.description: Services not directed to under 18. We do not knowingly collect minor's data. If discovered, we delete ASAP.
minors.contact: If you believe a child provided us info, contact contacto@seencel.com.

changes.title: 12. Changes to Policy
changes.description: We may update this policy. Material changes notified via:
items: Email to account address
Prominent notification on platform
Update of 'Last updated' date
changes.footer: We recommend reviewing periodically. Continued use constitutes acceptance.

contact.title: 13. Contact
contact.description: Questions about Privacy Policy or data practices:
items: General Email: contacto@seencel.com
Website: seencel.com
contact.commitment: We commit to responding within 5 business days.

quotes.client: Select an existing contact to associate with this quote.
quotes.project: Associate this quote with an existing project. Leave empty for quotations, bids, or pre-sales.

Forum.newThreadDescription: Start a new discussion in the course forum.
Forum.emptyDescription: Be the first to start a discussion. Ask questions, share ideas, or help other students.
Forum.noReplies: No replies yet. Be the first to respond!
Forum.deletePostDescription: This action cannot be undone. The reply will be permanently deleted.
Forum.threadTitlePlaceholder: What's your question or discussion topic?
Forum.threadContentPlaceholder: Describe your question or topic in detail...

Forum.selectThreadToView: Select a topic to view the conversation

unexpected.description: An unexpected error occurred. Our team has been notified.
